title: Diddy's rumored new girlfriend Lori Harvey unfollows him on Instagram
text:
Is there trouble in paradise for Diddy and Lori Harvey?

The pair have been romantically linked since July 2019, but Lori has now unfollowed Diddy on Instagram after the rapper, 49, was spotted out to dinner with Nicole Olivera on Friday, in photos obtained by The Shade Room.

That same weekend Lori, 22, was attending Howard University's Homecoming celebrations in Washington, D.C.

Trouble in paradise? Lori Harvey has now unfollowed Diddy on Instagram after the rapper was spotted out to dinner with Nicole Olivera on Friday

Still a fan: Though Lori is no longer among his Instagram followers, he's still following her (pictured May 2018)

She posted snaps from the festivities onto her Instagram account, gushing, 'My first time at #HowardHomecoming was LITTT.'

Though Lori is no longer among Diddy's Instagram followers, he is still following her.

Lori, who is the stepdaughter of Steve Harvey, is also still following his sons, Christian and Justin.

Diddy and Lori have been everywhere these last few months.

That's amore! Diddy and Lori have been seen travelling together these last few months to romantic locations including Italy and Mexico (pictured in Nerano, Italy August 2019)

Meanwhile: Harvey was at Howard University's Homecoming on the same weekend Diddy was spotted out to dinner

From Mexico to Italy, the rumored couple have been having a blast all over the globe.

Last month the couple were reportedly spotted returning to the US after a getaway to Cabo San Lucas, according to TMZ.

Though the relationship was never confirmed, rumors first circulated that the couple were dating after Diddy's alleged ex girlfriend Virginia claimed she saw the couple getting cosy at a Superbowl bash.

Aww: Lori flung her arms around her famous stepfather, Steve Harvey

TMZ also reported in July that Lori previously dated Diddy's 25-year-old son Justin Combs, and ended things with soccer superstar Memphis Depay last year.

Lori's step-father Steve has been married three times and has seven children — four biological and three step-children — and five grandchildren.

Harvey was first married to Marcia Harvey for 14 years before divorcing in 1994 and marrying Mary Lee for nearly a decade.

He then went on to wed Marjorie Elaine Harvey — Lori's mom — in 2007 after the couple dated in the early '90s.

Diddy's last long-term relationship was with singer Cassie Ventura.

The couple were together for 11 years before finally going their separate ways last October.

Cassie is now married and expecting her first child with husband Alex Fine.
description: The pair have been romantically linked since July 2019, but Lori has now unfollowed Diddy on Instagram after the rapper was spotted out to dinner with another woman.
